author: entertainment.ie
title: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: Abbeyglen Castle Hotel
text:
Abbeyglen Castle Hotel, Connemara, Co. Galway
ROMANTIC WEEKEND BREAK: €199pps & a 12.5% service charge – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on both evenings.
Includes complimentary Afternoon Tea daily, Champagne Reception, musical evenings and open fires.
This is a weekend offer, valid September 1 to November 30, 2015.
www.abbeyglen.ie
